OOC: Well, that's because I want to be serious. The characters you seen upo=
n my initial return were meant as jokes and those are the ones you criticiz=
ed. Spider is meant to be serious and Deemos and Arrow are two of my classi=
c characters that in my opinion were big hits. I've actually been in this R=
PG for the last 3 years, although I've had two large absences in there some=
where where I didn't post for a couple of months.

I just like being down o=
n myself, even when I do like my posts. I attribute this to the fact that m=
y posts in NBW have become few and rare. Thanks for your compliment, though=
...
